There are currently 7.4 billion people on the planet, and research suggests they like to eat 3x a day.  As the global population swells to over 9 billion people in the next few decades, radically improved agriculture production methods will be required.  The planet needs to produce more food in the next 40 years than it has produced in the past 10,000 years. SW/TCH will helps workforces to leverage existing IP, Platforms, distribution models and big data and help forge cross-industry alliances. recommendations: Johannes Hoech
Vice President of Marketing at Medrio
July 8, 2009, Mark worked with Johannes in the same group

If you want to know what is going on, which technology and business trends are driving the silicon valley or the economy at large, who is doing what where and who you can trust, and how that all adds up to a cogent direction for your business, Mark knows no peer. A man of boundless enthusiasm and energy, able to grasp the big picture, Mark is a great strategic adviser to senior executives as they are formulating their plans or figure out how to cope with economic conditions.Another key strength of Mark is his ability to understand and drive marketing strategy and marketing tactics. He just has an instinct for knowing how to market and sell things and for assembling a team of people around him that can complement that skill.If you're looking to grow your firm and you're looking for a senior level adviser that "gets it" and has the courage, intelligence and stamina to drive change, Mark and his Milestone Group is your ticket.

summary: Silicon Valley has shifted from 'high tech capital of the world' to 'industry disruption capital of the world'. Our Pop Up Innovation Lab is an intensive corporate innovation program in the heart of Silicon Valley. Teams of multidisciplinary executives are co-located in our Lab and work on a strategic company challenge or opportunity, typically projects having Board level visibility. Since 2001, we have worked with over 300 clients globally on a myriad of innovation, growth & revenue related performance improvement programs. Our clients have ranged from large multinationals down to startups. Industries we work in include tech, media, telco/mobile, financial services, retail, education, automotive/transport & healthcare.
